title: Bonfim
extract:
Bonfim is a city in the brazilian state of Roraima. It is located in the border of Guyana.


Get in

124 kilometres (77 mi) away from Boa Vista, by BR-401; six times per week bus service.
Vans and taxis go to the border city Lethem, Guyana, where it is possible to take a bus to Georgetown (10 to 14h trip).
